description: ISED located at 235 Queen Street, Ottawa and also Place du Portage, Phase 1, 50 Victoria St, Gatineau, PQ, requires the services of a Contractor to provide moving, transportation and installation services for various requirements.
duration_in_months: It is a duration for 12-13 months.
tags: Office furniture installation or reconfiguration service
full_summary:
### Office Relocation, Installation
#### Reference: cb-8673-5493993

The Innovation, Science and Economy Development Canada (ISED) is soliciting proposals for a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of moving, transportation, and installation services for their office relocation project. The services required include:

* Moving and relocation of office equipment and furniture
* Installation and configuration of office furniture and infrastructure
* Transportation and logistics services for the relocation process

#### Contract Overview

* Contract period: October 31, 2023 to September 30, 2024
* Optional: four (4) one-year periods available
* Solicitation Number: ISED 206480
* Publication Date: August 31, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 16, 2023, 2:00 PM ET
* Location: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Notice Information

* Tender Status: Expired
* Procurement Type: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

#### Related Documents
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8673/english---rfp-fm-moving-and-installation---final_.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8673/francais---rfp-fm-moving-and-installation---finale.pdf

#### Contact Information

* Shelley Bailey, Contracting Officer
* Email: shelley.bailey@ised-isde.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 596-3640
* Location: 235 Queen Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0P1, Canada

Note: The contact email, phone number, and location have been brought to the same place to maintain professionalism. I removed repetitive information and unclear or irrelevant text. I rephrased sentences and used industry terms for clarity
